sn1.77:4.3: What in the world is a rusty sword?
sn1.77:4.4: Who is a plague on the world?
sn1.77:5.1: Who gets arrested when they take things away?
sn1.77:5.2: And who is loved when they take things away?
sn1.77:5.3: And who is appreciated by the astute
sn1.77:5.4: when they come again and again?”
sn1.77:6.2: A woman is the best of goods.
sn1.77:6.3: Anger in the world is a rusty sword.
sn1.77:6.4: A bandit is a plague on the world.
sn1.77:7.1: A bandit gets arrested when they take things away.
sn1.77:7.2: And an ascetic is loved when they take things away.
sn1.77:7.3: An ascetic is appreciated by the astute
sn1.77:7.4: when they come again and again.”
